attributes.action: introduce deportation for third-time repeat offenders of violent crimes against the person
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The prisons are overcrowded and still, the amount of violent crime in the UK shows no sign of decreasing.
Of course there is a small but finite probability of an unsound conviction (say 1 in 10000) - but after the third conviction, the probability that all three convictions were unsound is surely the odds raised to the power three, e.g. 1 in 1000000000000.  Therefore, if someone is convicted three times of a violent crime against another person, perhaps it would be reasonable to permanently deport them to any country willing to accept them.
